about_the_game:
Welcome to the wildest and wackiest race of your life!
Get ready to dive into the chaos with our thrilling multiplayer party game - "Animal Falling"
Embark on a hilarious journey through colorful platforms as adorable cartoon animals, each in their unique ball shape. Challenge your friends or make new ones as you race to the finish line, but here's the twist – it's not just about speed!

Spice things up by adding obstacles, traps, and crazy items to obstruct and annoy your fellow players. From slippery banana peels to turbo-charged jetpacks, expect the unexpected!

Bring out your inner mischief and strategically place hurdles to make your rivals' journey a rollercoaster of surprises. Watch them tumble, slide, and bounce their way to victory or defeat!

Prove your mastery in the ultimate animal showdown and climb the ranks as the craziest critter on the block!


Invite your friends, customize your furry friend, and let the "Animal Fallin" begin! It's not just a race; it's a riot of laughter and mischief!

Get ready to roll, rumble, and revel in the furry mayhem!

name: Animal Falling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Animal falling is a multiplayer party game featuring cartoon animals in ball form, engaging players in a platform race filled with strategic obstacles and traps to hinder opponents. Unleash your mischief, obstruct rivals, and navigate the chaotic hilarity to victory in this wild, furry showdown!
